revision.revremark: Added Board and Ports panes, manual entry, still experimental

Use compositeVal type values (ports 1-5 for now), updated decoder schema, add LocoServo, add LocoIO (PIC) versions up to 1.54, show only show supported options by model (note VersionID is not stored in CV7 of LocoIO), Opcode (only for port 1 for now)
Changed address field labels hi/lo Use compositeVal type values (ports 1-8), add LocoBooster, Opcode1 and Opcode2 for ports 1-8

variable.tooltip: Button sends alternating code, default: unselected = fixed code

variable.label: Special Ports 1-4:
Speciale Poorten 1-4:

variable.label: Board Address (14 bit):
variable.tooltip: This provides the full address by combining the LocoIO Address upper and LocoIO Subaddress lower parts

variable.label: / SubAddress (7-bit high):
variable.tooltip: Message DSTH byte (editable in v1.46 and higher)

variable.label: / SubAddress (Fixed):
variable.tooltip: Message DSTH byte (not editable before v1.46)

label.text:
Max port address: 2048 (7 x 128 + 127 + 1). Port address is stored as (Hi * 128) + Low + 1.
Use the Mode combo boxes to define the port operation mode autofilling the Config and Value 2 fields.

Hoogste poortadres: 2048 (7 x 128 + 127 + 1). Poortadres bestaat uit (CV2 * 128) + CV1 + 1.
Selecteer in de keuzelijst het type poort. Dit vult Config- en Value 2-velden.
What values to enter on the Ports tab?
Kies een rij en vul de waarden in op tab Poorten

d'Information importante sur les Modules LocoIO HDL
JMRI 4.15.5 or later is required to use this definition.
JMRI 4.15.5 oder neuer erforderlich für diese Decoderdefinition.
JMRI 4.15.5 ou plus nouveau est réquis pour útiliser cette Definition Décodeur.
Vereist JMRI 4.15.5 of later met deze definitie.

TEST for SV Programming Ops Mode addressing (LOCONETSV1MODE), no Reading?


You have to select your PIC version and model when creating a roster entry.

Experimenteller SV-Programmierung auf dem Hauptgleis (LOCONETSV1MODE), nicht Lesen?


Handmässiger Modell- u. Versionsauswahl erforderlich

TEST voor SV's Programmeren via POM (LOCONETSV1MODE), niet Uitlezen?


Kies handmatig het type en PIC-versie bij het aanmaken van een Loc-definitie.

As an alternative for the HDL Windows LocoIO Config program, follow these steps:

Be careful to first disconnect all other LocoIO devices before changing a board's (sub)address (Broadcast).

Step 1: Connect power and LocoNet to the unit.
Step 2: You can now modify the CVs using CV byte or CV bit programming.
Step 3: Set desired options and click "Write to decoder".
Step 4: Your modifications have been saved and the decoder module is ready for use.
<html>For further information on this hardware and how to install it, please consult the manual available at http://users.telenet.be/deloof/<html>
<html>Weitere Informationen zur Anwendung dieser Hardware finden Sie in der digitalen Anleitung, verfügbar über http://users.telenet.be/deloof/<html>
Raadpleeg voor meer informatie over installatie en toepassing van deze hardware de handleiding, te vinden op users.telenet.be/deloof/
